title: Is this patch supposed to take this long to download?
body:
Every single time patches took me 20 mins max to download, now it's been one hour and it's still not done, is this patch that big or is there a bug?

Note:I'm not talking about it going over the limit thing, that's clearly a bug, it's normal but it just takes longer than ever.

replies.body: It might be that your ISP is having troubles or that it's having a hard time getting your connection through to our servers. Let's try adjusting your Port Forwarding and DNS settings to see if that helps first. Follow those steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know if that helps!
